subject: download Photoshop CS3 right today for only $89!
body:
On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it.
An optimist is a driver who thinks that empty space at the curb won't have a hydrant beside it.
Nature, time and patience are the three great physicians.
True disputants are like true sportsman: their whole delight is in the pursuit.
Many foxes grow gray but few grow good.
It is not the position, but the disposition.
It is not the situation that makes the man, but the man who makes the situation.
To most men experience is like the stern lights of a ship, which illuminate only the track it has passed.
It is what we do easily and what we like to do that we do well.
Never be so brief as to become obscure.
To believe a thing is impossible is to make it so.
When death overtakes us all that we have is left to others all that we are we take with us.
Reading is equivalent to thinking with someone else's head instead of with one's own.
Readers are plentiful: thinkers are rare.
That must be wonderful I have no idea of what it means.
He who strikes first, strikes twice.
One ad is worth more to a paper than forty editorials.
Worldly fame is but a breath of wind that blows now this way, and now that, and changes name as it changes direction.
What is the use of your pedigrees?
